Atom Collider.name: Atom Collider
Atom Collider.description: Accelerate enough material to high speeds, and you can create the first physical atoms in this pixellated world!
Atom Collider.bonus: +{% chance for an extra atom upon collision

description: Teleports monsters back to the start, and sets them all to a certain amount of HP.
Casts a wave of null and void, removing enemy colours.
